name: Building Complex Figma Variants: Collapsible Card
description:
A variants example to accompany the medium article "Building Complex Figma Variants" where I compiled the Galvanize UX Team's approach to complex variants.


Our living component has already evolved from the time when this blogpost was written, but the principles remain. A working version of this component, built by UX Dev Jamie Kupka, is coming soon to our open source component library, Paprika.


Hope this helps you on your variant creation journey ðŸ¥³
